mapper.select: select id, name, email from ceo where id = #{id}

select id, name, password, phone_number as phoneNumber, email, company_name as companyName, reg_date as regDate, fax_number as faxNumber, cp_number as cpNumber, address, site_name as siteName, co_number as coNumber, cm_number as cmNumber from ceo where id = #{id} and password = #{password}

select c.id as id, c.name, c.password, c.phone_number as phoneNumber, c.email, c.company_name as companyName, c.reg_date as regDate, c.fax_number as faxNumber, c.cp_number as cpNumber, c.address, c.site_name as siteName, c.co_number as coNumber, c.cm_number as cmNumber, s.logo, s.favicon, s.ship_charge as shipCharge from ceo c,site s where c.id = s.id and c.id = #{id}

choose.when: update ceo c, site s set c.name = #{name }, c.password = #{password }, c.phone_number = #{phoneNumber }, c.email = #{email }, c.company_name = #{companyName }, c.fax_number = #{faxNumber }, c.cp_number = #{cpNumber }, c.address = #{address }, c.site_name = #{email }, c.co_number = #{coNumber }, c.cm_number = #{cmNumber }, s.ceo = #{name }, s.ship_charge = 0, s.logo = #{logo }, s.favicon = #{favicon } where c.id=s.id and c.id =#{id }
choose.otherwise: update ceo c, site s set c.name = #{name }, c.password = #{password }, c.phone_number = #{phoneNumber }, c.email = #{email }, c.company_name = #{companyName }, c.fax_number = #{faxNumber }, c.cp_number = #{cpNumber }, c.address = #{address }, c.site_name = #{email }, c.co_number = #{coNumber }, c.cm_number = #{cmNumber }, s.ceo = #{name }, s.ship_charge = #{shipCharge }, s.logo = #{logo }, s.favicon = #{favicon } where c.id=s.id and c.id = #{id }

mapper.select: select ifnull(truncate((sum(item.now_price -(item.now_price * sale / 100)) - sum(item.sup_price)),0), 0) from ${id}.item, ${id}.stock, ${id}.order_item, ${id}.shop_order, ${id}.member where item.no = stock.item_no and stock.no = order_item.stock_no and order_item.order_no = shop_order.no and shop_order.member_no = member.no

select count(*) from (select shop_order.order_number as orderNumber from ${id}.item, ${id}.stock, ${id}.order_item, ${id}.shop_order, ${id}.member where item.no = stock.item_no and stock.no = order_item.stock_no and order_item.order_no = shop_order.no and shop_order.member_no = member.no group by shop_order.order_number) a
select count(statement) from ${id}.shop_order group by statement
